author: duftler
msg: A StringOutOfBoundsException was being thrown when a server returned a
header with no value to an Apache SOAP client. Thanks to
markh@vcitysoftware.com for raising this issue. See

author: duftler
msg: The code will now only store the target object in the ServletContext or
HTTPSession when it is newly created, and will not store it on each
invocation. Thanks to agauld@att.com for identifying this problem. See

author: duftler
msg: Fixed a bug that prevented the client from using a BeanSerializer to
serialize SOAP-encoded parameters within a Call labeled with the literalXML
encoding style. This issue was raised by Dirck Hecking.
